feed.title: Midrash Aggadah
feed.subtitle: A comprehensive resource for exploring midrash aggadah, featuring shiurim, source texts, and sefarim

entry.title: Yevamot 13a - Beit Hillel and Beit Shammai practiced love and friendship with one another
entry.summary: A shiur on "Yevamot 13a - Beit Hillel and Beit Shammai practiced love and friendship with one another" from Yevamot in the Ein Yaakov collection. Part of the comprehensive Midrash Aggadah learning series.
